articles.content: The government of the U.K. is granting that countrys equivalent to an emergency use authorization to remdesivir, the antiviral drug that Gilead Sciences and the National Institutes of Health develope… [+1989 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus may never go away, even with a vaccine - MSN Canada
articles.description: The pandemic could last for years. Embracing that reality is crucial to the next phase of America’s pandemic response. Experts urge U.S. leaders and public to start thinking long-term.
articles.content:
© Spencer Platt/Getty Images

articles.author: Berkeley Lovelace Jr.
articles.title: WHO says 'jury is still very much out' on whether coronavirus antibodies provide immunity - CNBC
articles.description: It remains unclear whether people who have been infected with the coronavirus are at risk of becoming infected again, WHO says.
articles.content:
It remains unclear whether people who have been infected with the coronavirus are at risk of becoming infected again, the World Health Organization said Wednesday.
